scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify app/scripts/index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/js/bundle.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run browserify
scripts.build: npm run html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.watch:scss: npm run scss && node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/css -wr app/styles
scripts.watch: npm run html && parallelshell 'npm run watch:scss' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run server'
